entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add XAML analyzers to avoid common pitfalls #13368
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI `StackLayout` complicates migration from Xamarin.Forms #13366
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Write device test to validate CharacterSpacing changes #13361
    Backlog
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: The style on this component requires your app theme to be Theme.MaterialComponent. #13356
    Backlog
  • Make IBorderElement properties settable #13349
    Backlog
  • Maui Shell Title View Disappearing after navigating through tabs (ios & Android) #13347
    Backlog
  • Add PointerPressed and PointerReleased events and commands to PointerGestureRecognizer #13346
    Backlog
  • Indicator view does not update using Visual states #13343
    Backlog
  • Content not rendered when setting FlowDirection as RightToLeft for ContentView in iOS and MacCatalyst #13342
    Backlog
  • Debugging/Deployment in iOS with net7.0 is broken #13340

Closed

  • .NET MAUI RC1 - CollectionView extremely slow #6317
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Label TextType="Html" Crash in Windows if html is "Broken" #11311
    Backlog
  • BoxView is rendered always with a black background #10850
    Backlog
  • BoxView BackgroundColor always gray #8972
    Backlog
  • Flyout on Windows doesn't display programmatically created entries. #12149
    Backlog
  • Button does not resize to fit text with CharacterSpacing #10293
    Backlog
  • [Scenario Days 02 Dec] Crash trying to use SearchHandler #11823
    Backlog
  • Shell Tabbar doesn't behave correctly when changing tab icon image (through binding or style triggers) #12105
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SetPadding for Entry does not work in .NET 7/MAUI 7 in Android #12224
    .NET 8 Planning
  • On Windows, ImageButton is set to isEnable=false. When isEnable=true is set, the button status is gray #13157
  • (Even empty app, not with other regular desktop browsers) MAUI.Blazor, with rapid (keyboard + mouse) input between multiple div element with contenteditable set to true, becomes unresponsive to mouse / touch #13314
  • Build `Android` fail #12990
  • [Bug] Shell.ForegroundColor in WINUI different from other platforms #3078
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Httpclient can't use header Host SNI #8673
  • FlyoutHeader does not render properly on ios #8769
  • Google Analytics implementation #13330
  • Google Ads implementation #13329
  • Long running GeoLocation #13335
  • App crash on iOS when using SQLite-net-pcl #13334

PullRequests

Created

  • SensorSpeed: unify sensor intervals across all platforms #13372
    community ✨
  • Geolocation: Add #nullable for Essentials Geolocation code #13371
    community ✨
  • [CI] Enure the pwsh is in the right dir. #13370
  • Clarify test #13363
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #13358
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Merge main to net8 #13345

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix crash using complex html content #11409
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 7.0.2 to 7.0.3 #13350
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump coverlet.collector from 3.1.2 to 3.2.0 #13359
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Changes in project template to avoid BoxView mistake #13348
    t/bug, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fixed dupe items in ShellView #13326
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Fix sizing of button when using CharacterSpacing #13250
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Finalize Essentials API Docs #13320
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • [core] WeakEventManager.RemoveEventHandler() should clear subscriptions #13333
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Don't lose the padding when background is set #13301
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • ItemContentControl - apply bindings once for ItemTemplate (Windows) #10999
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13337
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • reduce duplicate IndexOf calls #12599
    community ✨

Updated

  • Have Frame use MinimumHeight/Width for minimums instead of constraints #13336
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [Windows] Fix Shell FlyoutBackground property #13132
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Ensure OnMeasure always calls SetMeasuredDimension in ShellPageContainer #13153
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Fix Editor scrolling #13234
    area/controls 🎮
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [core] fix memory leaks in bindings #13327
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add shell pages via controller instead of handler #13332
    area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 #12768
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Handle renamed or deleted MauiImage files #13251
    area/single project ☝️
  • [All platforms] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #13137
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
